metaData.buttonText: You can apply for this benefit

content.heading: ufirstgold customers can enjoy a discount on Variable mortgage rates
content.content:
Apply for an Ulster Bank mortgage and you can enjoy tailored variable mortgage rates. 

Whether you're a first time buyer, moving home or looking to remortgage, there could be an Ulster Bank mortgage that's right for you.

The discount applies up to a maximum loan to value of 80% for ufirstgold customers.

**Illustrative quote**

Assuming a total amount of credit of €100,000 repayable over 20 years at a borrowing rate of 3.55% (variable), the cost per month is €582.53 excluding insurance. The total amount to be repaid is €139,845.20 which includes a release of security fee of €38. The Annual Percentage Rate of Charge is 3.6% (variable). The additional cost per month of a 1% rise in the rate of interest of such a mortgage is €52.82 and would be payable monthly.

This quotation is for illustrative purposes only and the actual repayment may vary. For the latest rates please check our [website](http://www.ulsterbank.ie/roi/personal/borrowing/mortgages.ashx).

Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply. Security, building insurance and life cover are required. Credit facilities are subject to repayment capacity and financial status and are not available to persons under 18 years of age. The loan amount is not based on one fixed formula. Factors reflecting the repayment capacity of each applicant are individually assessed based on a combination of factors including qualifying income, net disposable income and existing commitments. Applicant must reside in, and mortgage property must be in, the Republic of Ireland. Please note the monthly account fee for the ufirstgold current account is €14.

Minimum mortgage amount is €40,000. The maximum sum advanced is the lower of the purchase price or value of the property. A maximum loan to value of 80% is available for customers who have a ufirst or ufirstgold current account. The minimum term of the mortgage is 5 years and the maximum term is 35 years, subject to serviceability after retirement age.

If the Variable Rate Mortgage with a ufirstgold discount is not the best deal for you, we have a full range of mortgages which you can choose from.

WARNING: YOUR HOME IS AT RISK IF YOU DO NOT KEEP UP PAYMENTS ON A MORTGAGE OR ANY OTHER LOAN SECURED ON IT.

WARNING: IF YOU DO NOT MEET THE REPAYMENTS ON YOUR LOAN, YOUR ACCOUNT WILL GO INTO ARREARS. THIS MAY AFFECT YOUR CREDIT RATING, WHICH MAY LIMIT YOUR ABILITY TO ACCESS CREDIT IN THE FUTURE.

WARNING: THE COST OF YOUR MONTHLY REPAYMENTS MAY INCREASE.

metaData.heading: Need to apply for a tailored mortgage rate?

content.content:
You can apply for a mortgage with tailored rates at your local Ulster Bank branch

[Find your local Ulster Bank branch](http://locations.ulsterbank.com/ulster/locator/index.php/republic-of-ireland/)

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: Can I open more than one packaged account?

content.content: If you already hold a packaged account from Ulster Bank and are satisfied to open an additional packaged account, please note that there may not be any additional advantage for you opening another account for the following: Travel Service, Airport Lounge Access, Tailored Personal Loan Rates, Tailored Mortgage Rates, Commission Free Travel Money, Worldwide Travel Insurance and Car Insurance discount (if you have more than two packaged accounts). You will also be charged an additional monthly membership fee on the new packaged account.

content.heading: Are all the benefits available if I live abroad?

content.content: If you are living abroad or plan on living abroad, it is important to note that some of the benefits attached to your account are only available when you are visiting the Republic of Ireland or when you are resident in the Republic of Ireland. For further information please call ufirst Private Membership Services on *[1890 825 125](tel:1890825125)* or from outside the Republic of Ireland call *[00 44 2392 676 982](tel:00442392676982)*.
